trans-unit.source: about_Arrays
trans-unit.target: about_Arrays

trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: About Arrays
trans-unit.target: 有关数组

trans-unit.source: about_Arrays
trans-unit.target: about_Arrays

trans-unit.source: TOPIC
trans-unit.target: TOPIC

trans-unit.source: about_Arrays
trans-unit.target: about_Arrays

trans-unit.source: SHORT DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 简短说明

trans-unit.source: Describes arrays, which are data structures designed to store collections of items.
trans-unit.target: 描述数组，它是设计用来存储的项的集合的数据结构。

trans-unit.source: LONG DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 详细说明

trans-unit.source: An array is a data structure that is designed to store a collection of items.
trans-unit.target: 一个数组是一种设计用来存储项的集合数据结构。

trans-unit.source: The items can be the same type or different types.
trans-unit.target: 项可以是同一个或多个不同类型。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Windows PowerShell 3.0, a collection of zero or one object has some properties of arrays.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows PowerShell 3.0 开始，零个或一个对象的集合具有数组的一些属性。

trans-unit.source: CREATING AND INITIALIZING AN ARRAY
trans-unit.target: 创建和初始化数组

trans-unit.source: To create and initialize an array, assign multiple values to a variable.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建和初始化的数组，将多个值分配给一个变量中。

trans-unit.source: The values stored in the array are delimited with a comma and separated from the variable name by the assignment operator (=).
trans-unit.target: 数组中存储的值均以逗号分隔，并通过赋值运算符 （=） 分隔的变量名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, to create an array named $A that contains the seven numeric (int) values of 22, 5, 10, 8, 12, 9, and 80, type:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要创建名为 $A 包含 22、 5、 10、 8、 12、 9 和 80 的七个数字 (int) 值的数组，请键入︰

trans-unit.source: You can also create and initialize an array by using the range operator (..).
trans-unit.target: 您还可以创建和初始化的数组，通过使用范围运算符 （.）。

trans-unit.source: For example, to create and initialize an array named "$B" that contains the values 5 through 8, type:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要创建和初始化名为"$B"包含 5 到 8 的值的数组，请键入︰

trans-unit.source: As a result, $B contains four values: 5, 6, 7, and 8.
trans-unit.target: 因此，$B 包含四个值︰ 5、 6、 7 和 8。

trans-unit.source: When no data type is specified, Windows PowerShell creates each array as an object array (type: System.Object[]).
trans-unit.target: 当不指定任何数据类型时，Windows PowerShell 将创建一个对象数组作为每个数组 (类型︰ System.Object[])。

trans-unit.source: To determine the data type of an array, use the GetType() method.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定数组的数据类型，请使用 GetType() 方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, to determine the data type of the $a array, type:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要确定 $a 数组的数据类型，请键入︰

trans-unit.source: $a.GetType()
trans-unit.target: $a.GetType()

trans-unit.source: To create a strongly typed array, that is, an array that can contain only values of a particular type, cast the variable as an array type, such as string[], long[], or int32[].
trans-unit.target: 若要创建强类型化的数组，可以仅包含值的特定类型的数组转换为数组类型，如 string []、 长 [] 或 [int32] 该变量。

trans-unit.source: To cast an array, precede the variable name with an array type enclosed in brackets.
trans-unit.target: 若要强制转换数组时，变量名称在前面加上用方括号括起来的数组类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, to create a 32-bit integer array named $ia containing four integers (1500, 2230, 3350, and 4000), type:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要创建一个名为 $ia 包含四个整数 （1500年、 2230年、 3350 和 4000） 的 32 位整数数组，请键入︰

trans-unit.source: As a result, the $ia array can contain only integers.
trans-unit.target: 因此，$ia 数组可以包含仅的整数。

trans-unit.source: You can create arrays that are cast to any supported type in the Microsoft .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以强制转换为 Microsoft.NET Framework 中的任何受支持类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: For example, the objects that Get-Process retrieves to represent processes are of the System.Diagnostics.Process type.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Get 过程来表示流程中检索的对象是 System.Diagnostics.Process 类型。

trans-unit.source: To create a strongly typed array of process objects, enter the following command:
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的进程对象的强类型化的数组，输入以下命令︰

trans-unit.source: [Diagnostics.Process[]]$zz = Get-Process
trans-unit.target: [Diagnostics.Process[]]$zz = Get-process

trans-unit.source: THE ARRAY SUB-EXPRESSION OPERATOR
trans-unit.target: 数组的子表达式运算符

trans-unit.source: The array sub-expression operator creates an array, even if it contains zero or one object.
trans-unit.target: 数组的子表达式运算符创建一个数组，即使它包含零个或一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The syntax of the array operator is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 数组运算符的语法如下所示︰

trans-unit.source: You can use the array operator to create an array of zero or one object.
trans-unit.target: 数组运算符可用于创建零个或一个对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: PS C:>$a = @("One") PS C:>$a.Count
trans-unit.target: PS c: >$ = c: @("One") PS > $a.Count

trans-unit.source: PS C:>$b = @() PS C:>$b.Count
trans-unit.target: PS c: > $b = @ （PS） c: > $b.Count

trans-unit.source: The array operator is particularly useful in scripts when you are getting objects, but do not know how many objects you will get.
trans-unit.target: 在获取对象时，数组运算符是在脚本中特别有用，但不是知道会向您的对象数。

trans-unit.source: PS C:> $p = @(Get-Process Notepad)
trans-unit.target: PS $p c: > = @ （Get-process 记事本)

trans-unit.source: For more information about the array sub-expression operator, see about_Operators.
trans-unit.target: 有关数组的子表达式运算符的详细信息，请参阅 about_Operators。

trans-unit.source: READING AN ARRAY
trans-unit.target: 读取一个数组

trans-unit.source: You can refer to an array by using its variable name.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用其变量名称来引用数组。

trans-unit.source: To display all the elements in the array, type the array name.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示数组中的所有元素，请键入数组名。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: $a
You can refer to the elements in an array by using an index, beginning at position 0.
trans-unit.target: 您可以引用数组中元素使用的索引位置 0 处开始。

trans-unit.source: Enclose the index number in brackets.
trans-unit.target: 将索引号括在方括号内。

trans-unit.source: For example, to display the first element in the $a array, type:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要显示在 $a 数组的第一个元素，请键入︰

trans-unit.source: To display the third element in the $a array, type:
trans-unit.target: 若要显示在 $a 数组的第三个元素，请键入︰

trans-unit.source: Negative numbers count from the end of the array.
trans-unit.target: 从数组的末尾开始计数负数。

trans-unit.source: For example, "-1" refers to the last element of the array.
trans-unit.target: 例如，"-1"的最后一个引用数组的元素。

trans-unit.source: To display the last three elements of the array, type:
trans-unit.target: 若要显示该数组的最后三个元素，请键入︰

trans-unit.source: However, be cautious when using this notation.
trans-unit.target: 但是，应谨慎使用这一表示法。

trans-unit.source: This command does not refer to all the elements of the array, except for the last one.
trans-unit.target: 此命令不是所有数组的元素，最后一个除外指。

trans-unit.source: It refers to the first, last, and second-to-last elements in the array.
trans-unit.target: 它是指 first、 last、 和数组中的第二个至最后一个元素。

trans-unit.source: You can use the range operator to display a subset of all the values in an array.
trans-unit.target: Range 运算符可用于显示数组中的所有值的子集。

trans-unit.source: For example, to display the data elements at index position 1 through 3, type:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要显示的数据元素的索引位置 1 至 3，请键入︰

trans-unit.source: You can use the plus operator (+) to combine a range with a list of elements in an array.
trans-unit.target: 加法运算符 （+） 可用于将一系列组合的数组中元素的列表。

trans-unit.source: For example, to display the elements at index positions 0, 2, and 4 through 6, type:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要在索引位置 0、 2 和 4 到 6 显示元素，请键入︰

trans-unit.source: To determine how many items are in an array, use the Length property or its Count alias.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定数组中有多少项，请使用长度属性或其计数别名。

trans-unit.source: $a.Count
trans-unit.target: $a.Count

trans-unit.source: You can also use looping constructs, such as ForEach, For, and While loops, to refer to the elements in an array.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以使用循环构造，如 ForEach 中，对于，而 While 循环，若要引用数组中元素。

trans-unit.source: For example, to use a ForEach loop to display the elements in the $a array, type:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要使用 ForEach 循环显示 $a 数组中的元素，请键入︰

trans-unit.source: foreach ($element in $a) {$element}
trans-unit.target: foreach ($element) {$element}

trans-unit.source: The Foreach loop iterates through the array and returns each value in the array until reaching the end of the array.
trans-unit.target: Foreach 循环循环访问数组并返回数组中的每个值，直至到达该数组的结尾。

trans-unit.source: The For loop is useful when you are incrementing counters while examining the elements in an array.
trans-unit.target: For 循环都在检查数组中的元素的同时递增计数器时很有帮助。

trans-unit.source: For example, to use a For loop to return every other value in an array, type:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要使用的 For 循环的每个其他值返回数组中，键入︰

trans-unit.source: for ($i = 0; $i -le ($a.length - 1); $i += 2) {$a[$i]}
You can use a While loop to display the elements in an array until a defined condition is no longer true.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 While 循环，以显示数组中的元素，直到定义的条件不再为 true。

trans-unit.source: For example, to display the elements in the $a array while the array index is less than 4, type:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要显示 $a 数组元素的数组索引小于 4 时，请键入︰

trans-unit.source: $i=0 while($i -lt 4) {$a[$i]; $i++}
GET THE MEMBERS OF AN ARRAY
trans-unit.target: 获取一个数组中的成员

trans-unit.source: To get the properties and methods of an array, such as the Length property and the SetValue method, use the InputObject parameter of the Get-Member cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的属性和方法的一个数组，如 Length 属性和 SetValue 方法，请使用 Get-member cmdlet 的 InputObject 参数。

trans-unit.source: When you pipe an array to Get-Member, Windows PowerShell sends the items one at a time and Get-Member returns the type of each item in the array (ignoring duplicates).
trans-unit.target: 当通过管道传递给 Get-member 数组时，Windows PowerShell 以一次发送一个项目并获取成员 （忽略重复项） 的数组中返回的每个项的类型。

trans-unit.source: When you use the InputObject parameter, Get-Member returns the members of the array.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 InputObject 参数时，Get-member 将返回数组的成员。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command gets the members of the array in the $a variable.
trans-unit.target: 例如，以下命令将 $a 变量中获取数组的成员。

trans-unit.source: Get-Member -InputObject $a
trans-unit.target: Get-member-InputObject $

trans-unit.source: You can also get the members of an array by typing a comma (,) before the value that is piped to the Get-Member cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以获取数组的成员通过键入逗号 （，） 通过管道传递的值之前给 Get-member cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The comma makes the array the second item in an array of arrays.
trans-unit.target: 逗号在数组的数组类型设置数组的第二项。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell pipes the arrays one at a time and Get-Member returns the members of the array.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 管道数组一个传递一次，并获取成员返回数组的成员。

trans-unit.source: ,$a | Get-Member
trans-unit.target: ,$a |获取成员

trans-unit.source: ,(1,2,3) | Get-Member
MANIPULATING AN ARRAY
trans-unit.target: 操作数组

trans-unit.source: You can change the elements in an array, add an element to an array, and combine the values from two arrays into a third array.
trans-unit.target: 可以更改数组中的元素，将元素添加到数组，并将两个数组中的值合并到第三个数组。

trans-unit.source: To change the value of a particular element in an array, specify the array name and the index of the element that you want to change, and then use the assignment operator (=) to specify a new value for the element.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改的特定元素数组中的值，指定数组名称和您想要更改，该元素的索引以及如何将赋值运算符 （=） 来指定该元素的新值。

trans-unit.source: For example, to change the value of the second item in the $a array (index position 1) to 10, type:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要更改 $a 数组中的第二个项的值 （索引位置 1） 为 10，键入︰

trans-unit.source: You can also use the SetValue method of an array to change a value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用数组的 SetValue 方法来更改值。

trans-unit.source: The following example changes the second value (index position 1) of the $a array to 500:
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例更改第二个值 （索引位置 1） 的 $a 为 500 的数组︰

trans-unit.source: $a.SetValue(500,1)
trans-unit.target: $a.SetValue(500,1)

trans-unit.source: You can use the += operator to add an element to an array.
trans-unit.target: + = 运算符可用于将元素添加到一个数组。

trans-unit.source: When you use it, Windows PowerShell actually creates a new array with the values of the original array and the added value.
trans-unit.target: 当您使用它时，Windows PowerShell 实际上会创建一个新数组的原始数组和附加价值的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, to add an element with a value of 200 to the array in the $a variable, type:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要将具有值为 200 的元素添加到 $a 变量中的数组，请键入︰

trans-unit.source: It is not easy to delete elements from an array, but you can create a new array that contains only selected elements of an existing array.
trans-unit.target: 并不容易删除的元素从一个数组，但您可以创建仅包含所选的元素的现有数组的一个新数组。

trans-unit.source: For example, to create the $t array with all the elements in the $a array except for the value at index position 2, type:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要创建 $t 数组具有 $a 除外索引位置 2 处的值的数组中的所有元素，请键入︰

trans-unit.source: To combine two arrays into a single array, use the plus operator (+).
trans-unit.target: 若要将两个数组组合到一个数组，使用加法运算符 （+）。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates two arrays, combines them, and then displays the resulting combined array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建两个数组、 将它们，合并，然后显示结果的组合的数组。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the $z array contains 1, 3, 5, and 9.
trans-unit.target: 因此，$z 数组包含 1、 3、 5 和 9。

trans-unit.source: To delete an array, assign a value of $null to the array.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除一个数组，将 $null 值分配给数组中。

trans-unit.source: The following command deletes the array in the $a variable.
trans-unit.target: 下面的命令删除 $a 变量中的数组。

trans-unit.source: $a = $null
trans-unit.target: $ = $null

trans-unit.source: You can also use the Remove-Item cmdlet, but assigning a value of $null is faster, especially for large arrays.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以使用 Remove-item cmdlet 中，但赋值 $null 速度更快，尤其是对于大型数组。

trans-unit.source: ARRAYS OF ZERO OR ONE
trans-unit.target: 零个或一个数组

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Windows PowerShell 3.0, a collection of zero or one object has the Count and Length property.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows PowerShell 3.0 开始，零个或一个对象的集合具有计数和长度属性。

trans-unit.source: Also, you can index into an array of one object.
trans-unit.target: 此外，可以转换为一个对象数组进行索引。

trans-unit.source: This feature helps you to avoid scripting errors that occur when a command that expects a collection gets fewer than two items.
trans-unit.target: 此功能可帮助您就可以避免需要集合的命令将获取少于两个项时出现的脚本错误。

trans-unit.source: The following examples demonstrate this feature.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示此功能。

trans-unit.source: Zero objects
trans-unit.target: 零个对象

trans-unit.source: $a = $null $a.Count
trans-unit.target: $ = $null $a.Count

trans-unit.source: $a.Length
trans-unit.target: $a.Length

trans-unit.source: One object
trans-unit.target: 一个对象

trans-unit.source: $a = 4 $a.Count
trans-unit.target: $ = 4 $a.Count

trans-unit.source: $a.Length
trans-unit.target: $a.Length

trans-unit.source: SEE ALSO
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅

trans-unit.source: about_Assignment_Operators about_Hash_Tables about_Operators about_For about_Foreach about_While
trans-unit.target: about_Assignment_Operators about_Hash_Tables about_Operators about_For about_Foreach about_While
